channel.title: Tools on Kodebot
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on Kodebot

item.title: ECMAScript 6 - Sublime Text editor build system
item.description: The specification for ECMAScript 6 (aka ES6, ECMAScript harmony) is expected to be released in June 2015 and many tools, frameworks and browsers have started implementing the features of ES6. For example, Angular 2.0 and Aurelia allows us to write code in ES6 now. There are transpilers as well out there, which allows us to write code in ES6 and transpile them into ES5. I have come across two major transpilers traceur and babel, they are equally good.
